room_title: Escape room "The British are Coming" by Unlocked History Escape Rooms in Charlottesville
room_description: Itâ€™s 1781, the Revolutionary War is in its sixth year. British soldiers are dispatched to Charlottesville hoping to capture Thomas Jefferson and his family. You have 60 minutes to escape, but first, you must retrieve the Declaration of Independence hidden in the Monticello. so it does not fall into enemy hands. Escape before the British arrive.
